title: Review: The Vanpowers Urbanglide Standard E-Bike Offers A Great First Impressions
content:
A zippy, good-looking, and easy-to-ride urban e-bike that requires some hands-on build and maintenance.

Read the full article at Review: The Vanpowers Urbanglide Standard E-Bike Offers A Great First Impressions on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
